extendedInfo.description: Get the web, without the data plan!Smozzy Beta lets you use your T-Mobile* unlimited messaging plan to browse the web.  No data plan required!It works just like your Android phone's built-in browser, but the content is requested and delivered entirely via the text messages (SMS and MMS) included with your unlimited messaging plan.NOTE: This app currently works with U.S. T-MOBILE SERVICE ONLY. This application may send and receive a large number of messages, so use of it without an unlimited messaging plan is NOT recommended.   It is currently in beta, and has been tested only on Nexus S and HTC G2 devices.Please send any feedback to feedback@smozzy.com.*Update (9/18/2011): Smozzy has been updated with EXPERIMENTAL support for AT&T and Sprint customers, and COMPLETELY UNTESTED support for Verizon, Virgin, Cricket, Straight Talk, US Cellular, Viaero.  Support for all of these networks is likely to be buggier than support for T-Mobile, and for many of them will likely not work at all.   Send feedback to feedback@smozzy.com.

reviews.title: Creative but..
reviews.comment: My four stars are for the creativity and thinking outside of the box. Whit that said, it is painfully slow and make sure you have unlimited MMS.......
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working for me.
reviews.comment: Wish it did. SMS/MMS is sent & received but hangs with the message \"Received full response. Decoding...\". T-mobile myTouch 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I thought of it first :-(
reviews.comment: I have been trying to do this for longer than I can remember.  Unfortunately...  I don\'t have the problem solving skills required to make my app work properly.  For example; I would have NEVER thought of using a server to handle all the app requests.  I was trying to make the requests work using P2P tech..  Your creative thinking skills are second to none.  P.S.  That thing with the .PNG Files...  Absolute genius
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Still continues to say \"Request sent. Waiting for response...\" even after the mms has fully loaded. Can you fix this please?
reviews.author: ashley t

reviews.comment: Tried it on Vodafone Australia... Didn\'t work, but 5* love the idea, hope for some updates for the rest of the world.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did not work on T-mobile comet
reviews.comment: Did not work. SMS/MMS is sent & received but hangs with the message \"Received full response. Decoding...\". T-mobile comet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfectly!
reviews.comment: This is awesome, it is a little slow but it\'s free data!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Genius
reviews.comment: So good and simple, can\'t believe this isn\'t banned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I LOVE THIS APP
reviews.comment: My mom wouldnt get me a data plan so i turned to this and it works! OMG i cant even tell you how excited i am...Just wish it would be faster
reviews.author: Tommy Huynh

reviews.title: Nice concept, but...
reviews.comment: Stuck on \"Request sent. Waiting for response...\" on Droid Charge on Verizon. I like that the dev added untested support for VZW, but it doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Greatidea!
reviews.comment: This app is a wonderful app for those of us w/o data plans. However, I am always getting errors when using this app to browse the web that tell me to log into aim?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Concept!
reviews.comment: I have an unlimited data plan with T-Mobile but I just heard of this app and decided to give it a try. It is a really great concept but it is a little too slow for me. This would be a great app for someone who doesn\'t have data but needs to get data every once in a while.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FANTASTIC
reviews.comment: This is amazing. I thought of this idea myself way back when as well, but the implementation here is just FANTASTIC.  I wonder why this does not have many more downloads.
reviews.author: Joshua Lerman

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: Not working on AT&T for me. HTC G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very creative.
reviews.comment: Works on HTC Sensation. 4G...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Always says AIM smozzy and then some # is not avail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: It sends the request, then starts receiving, and never fully receives it
reviews.author: Vasia Sufuev

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: Helped me out big time in South Dakota. Worked Great. Thanks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would love for it to work!
reviews.comment: I am using an unlocked Samsung galaxy y with a 15 dollar a month t-mobile UL text plan. Unfortunately smozzy never loads webpages, but gets stuck in retrieving the data from the text message. 4 stars because it\'s an awesome idea, and I would love for it to work. ( hope a fix will be out soon! )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For me, this app does not work: I receive error text messages claiming that either my shortcode texting is disabled or expired... (sprint evo 3d)
reviews.author: A Google User
